whether a Basset had already been actioned"},"initiateRecol(address,address)":{"details":"Sends the affected Basset off to the Recollateraliser to be auctioned","params":{"_basset":"Address of the Basket, given that its target/collateral level is 0 As this is a cleanup operation, anybody should be able to perform this task","params":{"_assetToRemove":"The asset to remove from the basket"},"return":"bool To signify whether the asset was found and removed from the basket"},"setBasketWeights(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"External call to set weightings of a new Basket","params":{"_bassets":"Array of Basset addresses","_weights":"Array of Basset weights - summing 100% where 100% == 1e18"}},"setFeePool(address)":{"details":"Set the recipient address of forge fees","params":{"_feePool":"Address of the fee pool"}},"setRedemptionFee(uint256)":{"details":"Set the ecosystem fee for redeeming a masset","params":{"_redemptionFee":"Fee calculated in (%/100 * 1e18)"}},"upgradeForgeValidator(address)":{"details":"Upgrades the version of ForgeValidator protocol","params":{"_newForgeValidator":"Address of the new addBasset(address,bytes32).details: External func to allow the Manager to conduct add operations on the Basket

params._basset: Address of the ERC20 token to add to the Basket
params._key: Bytes32 key that will be used to lookup price in Oracle

params._basset: Address of the ERC20 token to add to the Basket

getAllBassetsAddress().return: return an array of bAssets addresses

handlePegLoss(address,bool).details: Executes the Auto Redistribution event by isolating the Basset from the Basket

params._basset: Address of the ERC20 token to isolate
params._belowPeg: Bool to describe whether the basset deviated below peg (t) or above (f)

handlePegLoss(address,bool).return: alreadyActioned Bool to show whether a Basset had already been actioned

initiateRecol(address,address).details: Sends the affected Basset off to the Recollateraliser to be auctioned

params._basset: Address of the Basset to isolate
params._recollateraliser: Address of the recollateraliser, to which the tokens should be sent

lockForgeValidator().details: Locks the ForgeValidator into it's final form

negatePegLoss(address).details: Negates the isolation of a given Basset

removeBasset(address).details: Removes a specific Asset from the Basket, given that its target/collateral level is 0 As this is a cleanup operation, anybody should be able to perform this task

params._assetToRemove: The asset to remove from the basket

removeBasset(address).return: bool To signify whether the asset was found and removed from the basket

setBasketWeights(address[],uint256[]).details: External call to set weightings of a new Basket

params._weights: Array of Basset weights - summing 100% where 100% == 1e18

setFeePool(address).details: Set the recipient address of forge fees

setRedemptionFee(uint256).details: Set the ecosystem fee for redeeming a masset

upgradeForgeValidator(address).details: Upgrades the version of ForgeValidator protocol

devdoc.title: MassetBasket
